data: The oppressive autumn weather continued for the next week and more, but the atmosphere in the house at Chelsea gradually cleared; at least, the electrical disturbances which had, as a matter of fact, culminated in Julianâ€™s departure for the club, subsided.

A Valiant Ignorance; vol. 2 of 3
A Novel in Three Volumes
